short_description: cps capital is an investment consultant & financial advisor based in perth, australia.
long_description:
cps capital group is a perth based boutique stockbroking firm providing specialty advice to retail, sophisticated and institutional investors across the globe. we thrive on building relationships with small to medium sized listed and unlisted entities who are seeking corporate advisory specialist who achieve maximum value. our services include;- trading & execution;- equity capital raisings including ipo/rto, placements, pre-ipo, underwriting and corporate restructuring;- listed and unlisted strategic corporate advice;- portfolio management
our sector experience includes metals & mining, technology, e-commerce, oil & gas, biotechnology, e-gaming and medical cannabis. our boutique offering enables us to be agile and swift so we can meet our clients needs building successful, prosperous and long lasting relationships. interested in hearing more. contact us on (08) 9223 2222 or email info@cpscapital.com.au
business_tags: corporate & finance | institutional investor | financial services | equity capital | corporate advice | trade execution | corporate advisory | portfolio management | mining

generated_description: cps capital, legally known as cps capital group pty ltd., based in perth, western australia, is a boutique corporate finance and stockbroking firm. established in 2001, the company provides specialist advice to retail, sophisticated, and institutional investors both within australia and globally. cps capital group offers a range of services including trading and execution, equity capital raisings, underwriting, corporate restructuring, listed and unlisted strategic corporate advice, and portfolio management. the firm's sector experience spans resources, technology, biotechnology, medical cannabis, e-commerce, oil and gas, and e-gaming. cps capital group is known for its agile and swift approach, aiming to build long-term relationships with small to medium-sized listed and unlisted entities.
